description: Workflow for Purrfect Pets entity handling pet search and pet details retrieval.
name: purrfect_pets_workflow

transitions.description: Start processing a pet search request, setting status and fetching results.
transitions.end_state_description: Pet search results have been fetched and stored
transitions.name: start_pet_search_request

transitions.description: Start processing a pet details request, fetching and enriching pet details.
transitions.end_state_description: Pet details have been fetched and enriched
transitions.name: start_pet_details_request
transitions.start_state_description: Pet search results have been fetched and stored
